scripts.dev: concurrently --names "shared,webapp,pocket,worker" "yarn workspace @project/shared dev" "sleep 9 && yarn workspace @project/webapp dev" "yarn workspace @project/pb dev" "sleep 9 && yarn workspace @project/worker dev"
scripts.clean: yarn workspaces foreach -R run clean && rm -rf pb/pocketbase
scripts.precommit: yarn run build:shared && yarn run lint && yarn run typecheck && yarn run format && yarn run test
scripts.staging: yarn run staging:build && yarn run staging:run
scripts.staging:up: yarn run staging:build && yarn run staging:run
scripts.staging:stop: docker stop $(docker ps -q --filter ancestor=video-ware:staging) 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm $(docker ps -aq --filter ancestor=video-ware:staging) 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.staging:clean: yarn run staging:stop && docker rmi video-ware:staging 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf staging_data
